Breaking black stereotypes

This is an event I attended in October 2022. It dealt with [[ Media ]] Representations of Black people, about the perpetuation of Stereotypes, and various instances of Erasing racism.

Things worth noting

  • There was a cool person, who later asked a great question about colorism in Dutch advertisement, who was knitting before the program started.
